thread.title: Renault-owned RCI Bank launches best-buy two-year savings bond
thread.title_full: Renault-owned RCI Bank launches best-buy two-year savings bond

author: Ed Monk
title: Renault-owned RCI Bank launches best-buy two-year savings bond
text: Renault-owned RCI Bank launches best-buy two-year savings bond Rates have been edging up thanks to competition between small challenger banks RCI, the UK banking arm of French auto giant Renault, now offers the best rates on two-year accounts By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 3:14PM BST 27 Jul 2015
